Installation¶

Development version¶

To install the development version of resVAE, simply git clone resVAE to your local computer, cd to the root directory, and run:

pip install -e .

Troubleshooting¶

If the installation fails, check the requirements.txt file for any dependencies you might be missing, or run:

pip install -r requirements.txt

from resVAE’s root directory.
